description:
ocLazyLoad is a library for Angular that let you dynamically load anything: angular components, external libs, templates, css, ... It's really easy to use and extensible. Discover how it could change the way you code your Angular applications in this short presentation.

Slides: http://slides.com/ocombe/ng-nl
short_description: ocLazyLoad is a library for Angular that let you dynamically load anything: angular components, external libs, templates, css, .

videos.title: Keep it light - Lazy load anything using ocLazyLoad

title: Keep it light - Lazy load anything using ocLazyLoad
